Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a basic raw good or inventory item used to prepare menu items.

name.description: The name of the product (e.g., 'Coffee Beans', 'Whole Milk').

description.description: A brief description of the product.

unit.description: The standard unit of measurement for the product.

CentralStockItem.title: Central Stock Item
CentralStockItem.description: Represents a product's stock level in the central warehouse.

quantity.description: The total quantity available in the central warehouse.

LocalStockItem.title: Local Stock Item
LocalStockItem.description: Represents a product's stock level in a specific location's inventory.

quantity.description: The quantity available at the local inventory.

RecipeIngredient.title: Recipe Ingredient
RecipeIngredient.description: A single ingredient and its quantity required for a menu item.

quantity.description: The amount of this product required for the recipe.

MenuItem.title: Menu Item
MenuItem.description: Represents a single item on the restaurant's menu, including its recipe.

name.description: The name of the menu item (e.g., 'Cheeseburger').

description.description: A brief description of the menu item.

price.description: The price of the menu item.

category.description: The category the menu item belongs to.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image for the menu item.

isAvailable.description: Whether the menu item is currently available to be ordered.

recipe.description: The list of ingredients and quantities required to make this item.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents a customer's order for a specific table at a specific location.

locationId.description: The ID of the location where the order was placed.

tableNumber.description: The table number for the order.

items.description: The list of menu items included in the order.

status.description: The current status of the order.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the order was created.

OrderItem.title: Order Item
OrderItem.description: Represents a single menu item within an order.

Location.title: Location
Location.description: Represents a single business location, like a coffee shop.

name.description: The display name of the location (e.g., 'Cafeter√≠a Avellaneda').

address.description: The physical address of the location.

isActive.description: Whether the location is currently operational.

StockTransfer.title: Stock Transfer
StockTransfer.description: Represents a transfer of stock from the central warehouse to a local inventory.

productId.description: The ID of the product being transferred.

status.description: The status of the stock transfer.

/products/{productId}.description: Master list of all raw goods and products.

/menuItems/{menuItemId}.description: Master list of all menu items offered, including their recipes.

/centralStock/{productId}.description: Stock levels of products in the central warehouse.

/locations/{locationId}/localStock/{prod.description: Stock levels for a specific product at a specific location.

/orders/{orderId}.description: Stores all customer orders from all locations.

/stockTransfers/{transferId}.description: History of all stock transfers from central to local inventories.
